plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 06-2216

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                              Appellant,

                                  v.

                           TALMUS R. TAYLOR,

                      Defendant, Appellee.




                             ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on July 9, 2008, is amended
as follows:

     On page 3, line 19:    "discretionary" should be "deferential"
